Package at.falb.games.alcatraz.api

This package contains all necessary classes and interfaces to play the game.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MoveListener This interface defines methods for the events which can be sent from the game board.
 

Class Summary
Alcatraz This class implements the game and provides methods to control the progress of the game.
Player An Alcatraz player.
Prisoner An Alcatraz prisoner.
 

Exception Summary
IllegalMoveException Exception indicating an illegal move.
 

Package at.falb.games.alcatraz.api Description

This package contains all necessary classes and interfaces to play the game.
